Bella Hat

  • Reference
  • class Music
  • View page source

class MusicÂ¶

Example

Initialize

# Import Music class
from bella_hat.music import Music

# Create a new Music object
music = Music()

Play sound

# Play a sound
music.sound_play("file.wav", volume=50)
# Play a sound in the background
music.sound_play_threading("file.wav", volume=80)
# Get sound length
music.sound_length("file.wav")

Play Music

# Play music
music.music_play("file.mp3")
# Play music in loop
music.music_play("file.mp3", loop=0)
# Play music in 3 times
music.music_play("file.mp3", loop=3)
# Play music in starts from 2 second
music.music_play("file.mp3", start=2)
# Set music volume
music.music_set_volume(50)
# Stop music
music.music_stop()
# Pause music
music.music_pause()
# Resume music
music.music_resume()

API

Bases: _Basic_class

Play music, sound affect and note control

Base note frequency for calculation (A4)

NOTE_BASE_INDEX = 69Â¶

Base note index for calculation (A4) MIDI compatible

sound_play(filename, volume=None)Â¶

Play sound effect file

Parameters:

filename (str) â sound effect file name

sound_play_threading(filename, volume=None)Â¶

Play sound effect in thread(in the background)

Parameters:

  • filename (str) â sound effect file name

  • volume (int) â volume 0-100, leave empty will not change volume

music_play(filename, loops=1, start=0.0, volume=None)Â¶

Play music file

Parameters:

  • filename (str) â sound file name

  • loops (int) â number of loops, 0:loop forever, 1:play once, 2:play twice, â¦

  • start (float) â start time in seconds

  • volume (int) â volume 0-100, leave empty will not change volume

Parameters:

value (int) â volume 0-100
